description:
all: remove now-unnecessary unreachable panics

Take advantage of the new terminating statement rule.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Please be sure NOT to do this to the subrepos.
Thanks.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=643dc3514250 ***

all: remove now-unnecessary unreachable panics

Take advantage of the new terminating statement rule.

R=golang-dev, r, gri
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7712044

Ack.

I only did this because I was debugging something for somebody and noticed
one in net/http, so I did all of them.

On Mon, Mar 11, 2013 at 3:08 PM, Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org> wrote:

> Please be sure NOT to do this to the subrepos.
> Thanks.
>
>

subject: code review 7712044: all: remove now-unnecessary unreachable panics
